meanings.definition: Of or relating to a zoea.
meanings.sent1: The tiny zoeal creature swam gracefully in the water.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the zoeal stage of the crab's development.
meanings.sent3: The zoeal dance competition at the ocean party was a hit!
meanings.sent4: Her zoeal movements on the dance floor were as delicate as a feather.
meanings.sent5: The zoeal features of the baby crab were fascinating to observe.

meanings.definition: Resembling a zoea in form or structure.
meanings.sent1: The toy had a zoeal shape that reminded me of a tiny crab.
meanings.sent2: The artist created a painting with zoeal patterns inspired by marine life.
meanings.sent3: The zoeal clouds in the sky looked like baby crabs floating above.
meanings.sent4: Her dress had a zoeal design that caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent5: The zoeal building stood out with its unique architectural style.
